suggestedTasks.title: Implement New Project Creation Modal Logic
suggestedTasks.description: Develop the full logic for creating a new project when the '+' card is clicked. This should include initializing the projecteditor.svelte with empty/default project fields, handling form validation, and managing the project creation workflow.
suggestedTasks.reason: Current implementation lacks complete project creation flow

suggestedTasks.title: Add Unit Tests for Project Creation Workflow
suggestedTasks.description: Create comprehensive unit tests for the new project creation feature, covering scenarios like successful project creation, validation checks, and edge cases in project naming and configuration.
suggestedTasks.reason: Ensure reliability of new project creation mechanism

patterns: Use of dynamic project color assignment

documentationNeeds: Update user guide with new project creation process
